overview:
Justin Bedecarre works with technology, media and venture capital companies in finding office space in San Francisco and the Silicon Valley. He advises YC backed 42Floors and Justin founded the War For Talent Conference in San Francisco.

At Cushman & Wakefield, his clients include Salesforce.com, AKQA, Leap Motion, True Ventures and many more. He focuses on talent, company culture, and business models when advising on real estate.

Justin founded the War For Talent conference boasting Silicon Valley’s greatest investors and entrepreneurs including Ron Conway, Dave McClure, Michael Wolfe, Jeff Lawson, Hiten Shah, Adam Pisoni, Jason Freedman among many others.

Bedecarre is an advisor to 42Floors, a YC company disrupting commercial real estate. Justin was an early advisor to 42Floors and presently works with the team on product design, company vision, monetization and industry expertise.

Techcrunch, GigaOM, VentureBeat, Silicon Valley Watcher and USA Today feature Justin in stories on trends in technology and commercial real estate.

relationships.title: Real Estate Solutions for Creative Companies
